entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers this evening. Snow at times mixed with rain beginning late this evening. Snow level 900 metres lowering to valley bottom near midnight. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow at times mixed with rain ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers. Snow level rising to 1200 metres in the morning. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early in the evening. Snow level 1200 metres. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 04 February 2023
